title: Folder: appsitemap
text: # Folder: appsitemap Purpose: additional sitemap files for specific modules/areas. Back to hub: ../index.md | TOC: ../TOC.md

title: Folder: App_Code
text: # Folder: App_Code - Purpose: Shared VB.NET code (services, models, utils) compiled at runtime in Web Site projects. - Notable subfolders: Data/, Handlers/, Rules/, Security/, Services/, VBCode/, Web/

title: Folder: App_Data
text: # Folder: App_Data Purpose: runtime data, logs, local DB files, controller configs (if any). Notes: - Do not deploy secrets here. - Code On Time often keeps controller XML here; review on server. Back

title: Folder: App_Themes
text: # Folder: App_Themes Purpose: ASP.NET Themes (skins, CSS). Themes include Citrus, eZee. Usage: Set via <pages theme="..."/> in web.config. Back to hub: ../index.md | TOC: ../TOC.md

title: Folder: App_WebReferences
text: # Folder: App_WebReferences Purpose: legacy ASMX web service references (e.g., sms providers). Back to hub: ../index.md | TOC: ../TOC.md

title: Folder: assets
text: # Folder: assets Purpose: generic assets used by docs or UI (images, icons, etc.). Back to hub: ../index.md | TOC: ../TOC.md

title: Folder: Backup
text: # Folder: Backup Purpose: backup copies and historical files. Not used at runtime. Back to hub: ../index.md | TOC: ../TOC.md

title: Folder: Bin
text: # Folder: Bin Purpose: compiled assemblies and dependencies. Managed by deployment. Back to hub: ../index.md | TOC: ../TOC.md

title: Folder: Controllers
text: # Folder: Controllers Purpose: page/controller definitions (Code On Time). May contain XML/JS. Back to hub: ../index.md | TOC: ../TOC.md

title: Folder: Controls
text: # Folder: Controls Purpose: reusable ASCX user controls and their .vb code-behind. Patterns: Bind in .ascx.vb; keep client IDs stable for JS. Back to hub: ../index.md | TOC: ../TOC.md

title: Folder: css
text: # Folder: css Purpose: site-wide CSS (modern-menu.css, themes helpers). Back to hub: ../index.md | TOC: ../TOC.md

title: Folder: fonts
text: # Folder: fonts Purpose: font files (e.g., webfonts for icons/typography). Back to hub: ../index.md | TOC: ../TOC.md

title: Folder: Handlers
text: # Folder: Handlers - Purpose: Low-level HTTP handlers (.ashx) for binary/file/event operations. - Examples: ThemeApplier.ashx. At root: Blob.ashx, Report.ashx, Import.ashx, Export.ashx, WebClientPrint

title: Folder: Help
text: # Folder: Help Purpose: help files and guides. Back to hub: ../index.md | TOC: ../TOC.md

title: Folder: images
text: # Folder: images Purpose: site images and icons. Back to hub: ../index.md | TOC: ../TOC.md

title: Folder: js
text: # Folder: js Purpose: JavaScript files (modern-menu-once.js, utilities). Back to hub: ../index.md | TOC: ../TOC.md

title: Folder: login
text: # Folder: login Purpose: login page assets. Back to hub: ../index.md | TOC: ../TOC.md

title: Folder: packages
text: # Folder: packages Purpose: NuGet packages management (packages.config) and related cache. Back to hub: ../index.md | TOC: ../TOC.md

title: Folder: Pages
text: # Folder: Pages - Purpose: Main application pages (ASPX) with business modules; role-protected via web.config <location>. - Menu source: Web.sitemap (security trimmed). Menu JSON via Pages/MenuApi.asp

title: Folder: Properties
